name: Corso_Riggs%27s_fianc%C3%A9
content: Corso Rigss's fiancé was a female Human living on Ord Mantell. She was the fiancé of Corso Riggs, after he first asked permission from her father and then had a few chaperoned dates between their families. However, after Corso's entire family was killed in the Separatist War he ran away and never saw her again.
